English: constantly comparing oneself to others will only make one angry (proverb)

h.b: ㄖㄣˊ　ㄅㄧˇ　ㄖㄣˊ　ㄑㄧˋ　ㄙˇ　ㄖㄣˊ

d.f: （`諺語~）`人生在世~`各~`有~`境遇~，`各~`見得~`失~，`若~`事事~`與~`人~`比較~`長短~，`則~`徒然~`自尋煩惱~，`落得~`生氣~`頹喪~。

h.p: rén bǐ rén qì sǐ rén

English: constantly comparing oneself to others will only make one angry (proverb)
